item.description:
Have you ever wanted to try kayaking or are new and want to add water miles ?  Then join me at Edgewater Canoe and kayak in Hooksett for a few hours of easy paddling. The boat rentals are ONLY $5/ hr. They come with a paddle and vest. You can try both single kayaks from 10' to 14' or double up with a friend in a tandem. We'll paddle up to the park and have a bite to eat so bring a lunch and some water. Also sunscreen ,your bathing suit to swim( the water is really warm) and your smiles. I will give a bsic paddling lesson to anyone needing it too.

Please call Rob to reserve a boat at 540-6520 or 485-9251. leave a message and he will just bring your boat at launch time.

You can also check them out on facebook 

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100002198253895

 

So join me on the water !

Cindy 315-0275

 

Rain will cancell this event.
item.name: learn to kayak at Edgewater
